about.title: ABOUT US
about.content: The chain of apartments located in Landmark 81 building is a chain of high-class hotel apartments Darlington Suite, with an area of ​​​​over 50m2, studio layout from 1 to 2 bedrooms to ensure extremely spacious and airy space, European standard furniture. . and fully equipped modern smart devices. We believe you will feel great with the style and experience here.

perNight.title: PER NIGHTS
perNight.content: Enjoy Our Classic Suites With All The Elegancy And Comfort That Its Interior Has… It Features Such Essentials As A Flat-Screen 45” TV, WiFi And 2 Bathrooms With A Living Room

amenities: Enhance your stay with our diverse range of hotel amenities
luxury: Discover the epitome of comfort and luxury with our hotel services

mattress.title: HIGH-QUALITY MATTRESS
mattress.desc: High-quality King/Queen size, with European Standard

tv.title: TV 55INCH 4K HD
tv.desc: Our guests can use Wi-Fi free throughout the hotel territory

content.item1: Just a small sample of testimonials received from people who visited

reviewItem.content: The room was spacious, beautiful and comfortable. The bathrooms were wonderful. The pool deck was great for sunset and people watching - Anthony and Liz were exceptional hosts. Highly recommended.

gallery.title: Gallery our Hotel
gallery.content: 35 elegantly furnished and air conditioned classic rooms, which will be a perfect pick both for business and leisure travelers …
